text:
"Glamtron" is the debut mixtape by American drag performer and rapper Alaska Thunderfuck 5000. It was released on October 7, 2009 through Sony Music-distributed label Music With a Twist Entertainment. It Sfeatures live performances by Thunderfuck in the Trannyshack located in Los Angeles, California.
Track listing.
All tracks were arranged and produced by Jefree Star and Matt Farber, from the Sony Music label.
